statements: DELETE FROM encrypted_payment_info WHERE card_holder_name = 'Alice' AND expiration_date = '2023-12-31';
DELETE FROM encrypted_payments WHERE payment_amount < 500 AND payment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id IN (SELECT key_id FROM encrypted_payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000);
DELETE FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000 AND status = 'pending';
DELETE FROM payment_audit_logs WHERE user_id = 123 AND action_taken = 'DELETE' AND audit_log_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614173000';
DELETE FROM payment_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND status = 'PENDING';
DELETE FROM payment_transactions WHERE user_id = 2002 AND transaction_amount > 100.00;
DELETE FROM payment_logs WHERE log_timestamp < NOW() - INTERVAL '1 month';
